document.full_text: there are three productions of "macbeth" under way in new york this month, but admirers of shakespeare's lighter work have an alternative: the acting company's production of "the comedy of errors."
document.title: pace offers shakespeare fans an alternative
lines_and_colors: there are three productions of "macbeth" under way in new york this month, but admirers of shakespeare's lighter work have an alternative: the acting company's production of "the comedy of errors."
